name: Savory Carrots
author: Sam Lichlyter
steps: Preheat oven to 425Âº F
Peel carrots
Cut carrots into 1/2 inch thick coins and place on baking sheet
Add oil to carrots
Sprinkle on garlic powder, paprika, salt, and pepper
Mix together
Place in oven, flip after 10 minutes, cook for another 8-15 minutes

steps: Salt and pepper patties
Preheat cast iron pan until it starts to slightly smoke
Place patties in pan until they start to darken around the edges and liquid seeps from the top
Flip patties
Wait approximately 2 minutes, then place cheese on each patty
Once cheese is melted, remove from pan and let rest for 4-5 minutes
Toast buns in a toaster oven for 2-3 minutes from cold
Prepare by placing mayo on both sides of the bun, place patty in bun, cut in half
Serve with either fries or tots
